dagger to sword, you have to convert from dagger to sword. You can't convert from body to dagger. The alchemical effects of the
equipment will be retained even after conversion, so don't worry about that. I can do various things, but each of them is limited
to once each time we meet, so please be careful about that.

type of equipment you enhance will be the same: sword for sword, shield for shield, not shield for greatsword, etc. The alchemical
effects of the equipment will be retained even if you enhance it. You can strengthen your equipment without worrying about the effects
being lost. Also, you can only strengthen your equipment once each time you meet with them. If you want to strengthen it again, please do
so when we meet again!

not complain no matter what effect is added, okay? The effect that tends to be attached differs depending on the characteristics of
the equipment. For example, robes tend to have magic effects.

132839.「ちょっと！ この装備には\n 効果が ひとつも 付いていないみたいだよ。\n:

one of the adventurers who have come to climb
this mysterious tower!

132849.「この装備の 錬金効果をチェンジするのね！\n 何が付くかは やってみての お楽:
You can change the alchemy effect of this equipment! You'll see what you get when you try it. It will cost you <%dL_RENKIN_GOLD>
gold. The current alchemy effect will be completely lost, but are you sure you want to give it a try?

132850.<se_nots System 7>\n「お気に入りの 錬金は付いたかな？\n:
<se_nots System 7>

<end>

132851.「わかったわ。\n そこで 少し待っててね……。\n<bw_break>:
All right, I'll be right there. So, I'll just

132858.「<%sL_WATASU_ITEM>を\n どれに 変換するんだ？\n<brea:
Which one do you convert <%sL_WATASU_ITEM> to?
<break>

132859.「オレさまは 今持っている装備を\n 別の装備に 変換することが できるんだ。\:
I can convert your equipment to other equipment. The better the equipment, the higher the price. If you want to convert from
dagger to sword, you have to convert from dagger to sword. You can't convert from body to dagger. The alchemical effects of the
equipment will be retained even after conversion, so don't worry about that. I can do various things, but each of them is limited
to once each time we meet, so please be careful about that.

132860.「選んだ装備品の 錬金効果を\n 全部 新しいものにチェンジしちゃうよ。\n た:
All the alchemical effects of the selected equipment will be changed to new ones. However, Accessory is not included. The number
of effects will not change from the original number. +If it is +2, it will remain +2. But the effect depends on my mood! No matter what
effect is added, I have no complaints. Also, all previous effects will be erased. By the way, effects tend to attach differently
depending on the characteristics of the equipment. For example, robes tend to have magic effects.

132861.「オレさまは 今持っている装備を\n 別の装備に 変換することが できるんだ。\:
I can convert your equipment to other equipment. The better the equipment, the higher the price. If you want to convert from
dagger to sword, you have to convert from dagger to sword. You can't convert from body to dagger. The alchemical effect of the
equipment is retained after conversion, so don't worry about that. You can only convert equipment and reapply alchemy once each time
you meet, so please be careful about that.

132862.「あなたの持ってる 装備品に\n 新しい錬金効果を ひとつ付けてあげるよ。\n:
I will add a new alchemical effect to your equipment. However, Accessory is not included. If you want to add an effect to your +3
equipment, I will ask you to choose one effect to remove after adding the effect. Furthermore, the effect you get is up to my
mood! No matter what effect is added, I have no complaints. By the way, the effects that tend to be attached differ depending on the
characteristics of the equipment. For example, robes tend to have magic effects.

132864.「わかったぜ。\n そこで 少し待っててくれ……。\n<se Joutyu_SE:
